**Canada's Natural Resources Supports Rural and Remote Communities with Audits**
===============

#### Tender Notice Reference Information

*   **Tender Reference Number**: NRCAN-5000081220
*   **Tender Title**: Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement for Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audit
*   **Date Published**: May 8, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: May 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

#### Procurement Description

Natural Resources Canada invites bids for a Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement, for stream #8 - Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audit. The selected supplier will provide audit services for the Clean Energy for Rural and Remote Communities Program.

#### Key Dates and Information

*   **Contract Start Date**: June 10, 2024
*   **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025
*   **Notice of Tender PDF**: [Download our Notice of Tender](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37768/notice-of-proposed-procurement---nrcan-5000081220.pdf)
*   **Tender Description**: Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement for Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audit for stream #8 - Clean Energy for Rural and Remote Communities.

#### Key Contact Information

*   **Point of Contact**: Anik Samson, [anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca), (613) 408-3462

For complete details, please refer to the Notice of Tender document. The selected supplier will be required to provide Professional Audit Support Services for stream #8 in accordance with the agreed-upon criteria.
